info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 10:36PM EST until February 04 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of a trace to 3 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to one half of an inch. * WHERE...In New York, Eastern Greene, and Columbia Counties. In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. In Connecticut, Litchfield County. * WHEN...Until 5 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning and Friday evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
